message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $140?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $140 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to come down to $110?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $125, but I'm not going any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
